title: Slow Cooker Lentil Soup with Bacon

Ingredients.5: 0.5 (16 ounce) package bacon, chopped, or more to taste

Directions.1: Rinse lentils well under cold running water. Drain and transfer to a slow cooker. Pour in water until water level is twice as high as lentils. Add bay leaf and set slow cooker to High.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, heat onion and bacon in a skillet over medium heat. Cook until bacon is crispy, 5 to 10 minutes. Season with garlic powder and transfer bacon-onion mixture to the slow cooker.

Directions.3: Cook on High until lentils are tender, about 5 hours.
